name: Starman's VR Experience
description: Experience Starman's amazing journey through our solar system in Virtual Reality. See a 'live' view from the cherry red sports car or move in time to see future events.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7, 8, 10 Memory: 8192 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 +
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7, 8, 10 Memory: 16384 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 +
